alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:28PM CDT until July 21 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Waldron, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Y City... Boles... Parks... Needmore... Cedar Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
